entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as the one who finished reading a letter and drew out something else. He is described as growling.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley's letter is mentioned as being covered in stamps except for a square inch on the front.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon received Mrs. Weasley's letter, which was covered in stamps except for a square inch on the front.
